text: Jim Gordon (February 15, 1927 â€“ February 16, 2003) was a sportscaster who called games for the New York Giants, New York Rangers, and the New York Knicks. He also hosted pregame/postgame shows for the Brooklyn Dodgers in his early career. He also called National Hockey League games for CBS and the original NHL Network. Gordon has also called boxing matches along with college football and basketball games. title: Jim Gordon
